name: Board Combinations
description: Board combinations is a traditional board game similar to connect 4. The game features a player vs computer system, where the player goes head-to-head with a computer player to succeed as the winner. Board combination is a turn based game with piece placements and removal. In order to win at the game the player has to remove all the opponents piece from the game board and also prevent his pieces from being removed. To enable the removal sequence the player would need to align all his pieces in a straight line, either vertically or horizontally to win. Note: this also goes for the dark enemy.
